alert.note: Alert for Crowley County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 2:46PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Otero, southern Crowley and eastern Pueblo Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 246 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fowler, or 26 miles west of La Junta, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fowler, Ordway, Manzanola, Olney Springs, Sugar City and Crowley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
